00097 
00098     //--------------------------------------------------//
00099     // The following vars are for storing percentages
00100     // that are not realized because the percentage
00101     // are too small to produce one integer faculty.
00102     // They are accumulated here, so that they will
00103     // be added to the following calculations to
00104     // produce a overall population that reflects
00105     // the percentages calculated. They are set to zero
00106     // in init().
00107     //--------------------------------------------------//
00108 
00109     // since it's a fraction of an integer, so the var type is float
00110     float         unused_faculty_count_array[GENDER_ETHNIC_TYPE_COUNT];
